meanings.definition: The quality or state of being memorable.
meanings.sent1: The memorabilities of the party made it unforgettable.
meanings.sent2: She cherished the memorabilities of her childhood.
meanings.sent3: The memorabilities of the cat wearing a hat brought a smile to everyone's face.
meanings.sent4: The memorabilities of the old house whispered stories of the past.
meanings.sent5: The vivid memorabilities of the fireworks display stayed with her for years.

meanings.sent1: The memorabilities of the trip were captured in her photo album.
meanings.sent2: Family traditions are some of the most cherished memorabilities.
meanings.sent3: The memorabilities of the talking parrot were quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The memorabilities of the mountain view were like treasures in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The striking memorabilities of the sunset painted the sky in vibrant colors.
